text: Hello! My name is Oleg. I am results-oriented software developer and research professional. I make it my goal to create software with the user in mind, creating applications with a useable and intuitive user interface experience. I also understand the importance of creating highly readable and easily maintainable source code. I am constantly striving to learn new technologies and look to ways to better myself in this rapidly  changing industry.
psBefor: P.S. If you find a bug or you have ideas on how to do it better, please
